text:
Thank you <@UD53A9UUR> :slightly_smiling_face:

Thanks for your help this week too! I think it’s nice to help out where I can; and a bonus is that it can be a great way to learn more about the platforms I’m working with.
I get a couple of cookie related errors... cross site request related but nothing else
Is there a way to add read time to a Pillar / Landing Page that uses individual modules?
Can you screenshot those? I believe those are likely the issue
<@U2H3TT8F2> and <@UM89ZFEKU> are exploring some slack apps we can install to help award folks too.... but I like the channel as well

Curious, outside the inbound and technical consultant fees, does HubSpot provide any development services for a fee if there was something you didn’t have the capabilities or bandwidth to do yourself in house?

So aside from the migrations <https://www.HubSpot.com/services/professional/migrations>

and technical consultation, no we don’t offer that as a service.

We would recommend you look for a HubSpot Partner agency that has the skillsets you need. Our directory of certified partners:
<https://www.HubSpot.com/agencies>


If you need something you feel is really advanced. I’d honestly recommend posting in this slack under <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> a description of the type of work you’re looking for. There are a ton of very highly skilled HubSpot CMS and API Developers on here.

If you want to vet a CMS developer for quality, 1 indicator would be having the CMS for developers Certification. API developers currently do not have a certification available.

That said a good way to vet the API developers might be to ask them if they have any API integrations on the App marketplace
<@UKGV272KS>, feel free to shoot me a dm if you need help :wink:
Hey <@UA5DFM7CK>! The team pushed a fix to address this behavior, so it shouldn’t happen next time you upload a video via the page editor. Enjoy your weekend! :slightly_smiling_face:
<@UDPJ43B39> awesome! Thanks so much for the update.
